presentation.apprestrictions: woclass='ACTIVITY' and istask=1 and status in ('GGK', 'INUITV') and (laborcode in (select crewid from NTLABORCREW where ntactive=1 and laborcode = :&personid&) or laborcode = :&personid&) and nvl(SCHEDULEDATE,sysdate)<=(sysdate + INTERVAL '12' HOUR) and (exists ( select 1 from locations where location=wmASSIGNMENT.WORKLOCATION and ntlocqual=0) or not exists (select 1 from PLUSTWOQUALREQ where PLUSTWOQUALREQ.wonum = wmassignment.wonum and not exists (select 1 from LABORQUAL where LABORQUAL.LABORCODE = :&personid& and PLUSTWOQUALREQ.QUALIFICATIONID = LABORQUAL.QUALIFICATIONID and status='ACTIVE' and nvl(effdate, sysdate-1)< sysdate AND nvl(enddate, sysdate+1) > sysdate )))

datasrc.whereclause: personid in (select personid from maxuser where userid = :user)

helpgrid.innerhtml: This tab summarizes all missed check points, inspections or required values. All required values must be entered before the task can be stopped.
Missed check points: close the check points displayed.
Found defects: verify a follow up work order has been created for the defect.
Required values: enter the measured value and, if not displayed, the measure unit.
This tab summarizes all missed check points, inspections or required values. All required values must be entered before the task can be stopped.
Missed check points: close the check points displayed.
Found defects: verify a follow up work order has been created for the defect.
Required values: enter the measured value and, if not displayed, the measure unit.

helpgrid.innerhtml:
Do the planned serial numbers for install/remove match the actual ones?
If not, press CANCEL and interrupt the task.
Choose reassign and enter the mismatched part and serial number in the memo-field.

statictext.label:
De stel/stam is nog niet binnengeplust op locatie. De taak mag nog niet gestart worden.
Vraag de Teamleider/WVB om de stel/stam binnen te plussen.
